questions.onset: When did the shortness of breath start? Was it sudden or gradual?
questions.severity: On a scale of 1-10, how severe is your breathing difficulty?
questions.rest_or_exertion: Does it occur at rest or only with activity?
questions.chest_pain: Do you have any chest pain along with the shortness of breath?
questions.risk_factors: Do you have any of these: recent surgery, long travel, leg swelling, history of blood clots?
questions.duration: How long have you been experiencing this?

triage_rules.expression: 'sudden' in str(onset).lower() and 'rest' in str(rest_or_exertion).lower() and int(severity) >= 7 and ('yes' in str(risk_factors).lower() or 'surgery' in str(risk_factors).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Possible Pulmonary Embolism (PE) - Immediate Emergency Care Required
Severe shortness of breath at rest - Emergency evaluation needed
Moderate shortness of breath with chest pain - Urgent evaluation needed
